body: Because `Variable` and `SavedVariable` depend on the structure of each other being defined (`Variable&` in the constructor of `SavedVariable`, `SavedVariable` returned from `Variable::save()`)
body_html: Because Variable and SavedVariable depend on the structure of each other being defined (Variable& in the constructor of SavedVariable, SavedVariable returned from Variable::save())
